entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • SOS DumpIL command unable to decode the IL of a PInvoke or ReversePInvoke IL Stub #3005
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-counters]: Counters that show memory should format the string #303
    8.0.0
  • Make diagnostics tools aware of MacOS sandboxed apps #277
    8.0.0
  • Implement SOS command StopOnException on Linux/MacOS. #111
    8.0.0
  • User Story: Enable diagnosing common Async problems #90
    8.0.0
  • User Story: Expose .NET Core Perf Counters for App Insights Live Metrics page #84
    8.0.0
  • [SOS][Linux] Managed breakpoints are lost after application restart #53
    8.0.0
  • Add DumpHeapStat code to SOS. #51
    8.0.0
  • Add SOS testing for Windows and Linux arm architectures #39
    8.0.0
  • Make dotnet-counters pause actually pause the RuntimeEventSource #578
    8.0.0
  • Implement a general test executor for all trace tools #571
    8.0.0
  • Add TraceInfo to dotnet-trace traces (similar to PerfView) #568
    8.0.0
  • Using SOS programmatically #565
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Live viewer for events from event pipe #564
    8.0.0
  • Add new tool for tailing logs #547
    8.0.0
  • dotnet trace should show filter data in output #538
    8.0.0
  • Add dumprequests command to sos #536
    8.0.0
  • dotnet dump collect should generate dump with process name in the dump name #535
    8.0.0
  • Add threadpool -stat #531
    8.0.0
  • Improve scenarios where dump analyze commands spew lots of output #529
    8.0.0
  • dotnet dump analyze should work with x86 and x64 dumps seamlessly #522
    8.0.0
  • Allow dump generation based on CPU, Memory, EventCounter/EventSource, 1st/2nd Chance Exception #517
    8.0.0
  • dotnet tools shouldn't error if no arguments are provided #510
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-counters] Toggling resume/pause can only occur as fast as event updates #497
    8.0.0
  • [feature request] non-Windows lightweight event viewer #489
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Add more runtime counters for ThreadPool scheduling latency, LOH/SOH alloc rate, GC timings #470
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Percentile or Histogram based statistics avilable for the runtime #469
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Trace callstacks include native frames #465
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Allow tracing configuration to stop after long GC #464
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Ability to get context switch information in a trace #463
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-dump] Allow collect to start the proccess itself. #404
    8.0.0
  • dotnet.exe should not appear in "dotnet counters list-processes" #372
    8.0.0
  • Investigate: Use a file format for dotnet-trace profiles #337
    8.0.0
  • list-processes command shows processes from other users #314
    8.0.0
  • Misleading error message for dotnet-* tools when working cross container #1528
    8.0.0
  • Feature request: dotnet-symbol should acquire RedHat symbols #1506
    8.0.0
  • Feature request: Use dotnet-tools cross container without requiring a file-mount #1505
    8.0.0
  • Assume hex values (without the 0x prefix) on dotnet-dump command options #1460
    8.0.0
  • Add EventSource instrumentation to all .NET IO #1409
    8.0.0
  • SOS Plugin for Visual Studio #1397
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-dump: Add dump location path to DAC/DBI and assembly module search #1349
    8.0.0
  • Add Ubuntu 20.04 to the diagnostics repo test matrix #1131
    8.0.0
  • Running dotnet-counters in the background #1098
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime EventPipeProvider giving lot of CounterProfile. Need only CPU and Working set #1067
    8.0.0
  • Investigate ways for dotnet-dump collect to take coredumps without SYS_PTRACE #896
    8.0.0
  • Add EventPipe at Startup tests #883
    8.0.0
  • Use diagnostics global tools functionality at runtime for problem reporting #844
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] dotnet trace should trigger based on namespace and frequency #832
    8.0.0
  • Inspecting thread static value for generic class failed in SOS #818
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] dotnet-counters should support taking a single snapshot and exiting #811
    8.0.0
  • Support `dotnet trace` running in a sidecar container #810
    8.0.0
  • Remove alignment requirements in the EventPipe format #805
    8.0.0
  • Extract EventPipeEventSource from TraceEvent and make it part of Microsoft.Diagnostics.NetCore.Client #803
    8.0.0
  • GetTransport(int processId) does not work in sidecar containers #746
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-gcdump should trigger warning if the heap size is huge #723
    8.0.0
  • WinDbg SOS Just Won't Give Up On Symbol Files #675
    8.0.0
  • EventCounter allocates temp objects #621
    8.0.0
  • IpcClient suggestions #613
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Support dotnet OOB tools operating across a container boundary #596
    8.0.0
  • Using dotnet-counters tool stops internal EventListener #2664
    8.0.0
  • [Request] Need a crossdac and CLRMD reader to analyze macOS dumps on Windows #2590
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Add support for reporting with pprof's profile.proto format in CLI tools #2563
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request]: Support triggers for dotnet-dump #2478
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: Get entrypoint assembly via diagnostic IPC protocol #2198
    8.0.0
  • When CLR hasn't been initialized in the process, SOS should mention that when commands fail #2197
    8.0.0
  • API Proposal: Make the abstract IpcEndpoint class public instead of internal #2181
    8.0.0
  • Add support for TcpIP in all tooling using ReverseDiagnosticsServer. #2160
    8.0.0
  • API Proposal: Refactor ReversedDiagnosticsServer and *EndpointInfoSource classes #2131
    8.0.0
  • Necessary permissions in docker using a rootless user for dotnet-* tools #2102
    8.0.0
  • [Feature request] Moar GC counters! #2089
    8.0.0
  • debug-dump analyze for gen2/loh #2071
    8.0.0
  • dotnet trace as client for pyroscope (format) #2068
    8.0.0
  • Expose DiagnosticsClient.GetProcessInfo #1991
    8.0.0
  • Pinpointing a static gcroot with sos #1922
    8.0.0
  • Make DiagnosticClient start the client process to capture early stages events #1810
    8.0.0
  • Add maxcounters property to dotnet-counters monitoring. #1769
    8.0.0
  • Support dynamic instance counters in dotnet-counters monitoring #1767
    8.0.0
  • Create Microsoft provided container images with diagnostic tools pre-installed #1720
    8.0.0
  • Retire duplicate documentation on diagnostics repo #1682
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-dump command line UX for displaying help could be improved #1656
    8.0.0
  • Implement dumpstring command #1651
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-dump is incredibly slow in dumpheap scenario #1637
    8.0.0
  • Improve the usability of SOS around open/closed generic types #1573
    8.0.0
  • Add support for .netconfig in dotnet-counters #1536
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-trace] Add option to stop tracing on trigger #3125
    8.0.0
  • Consider adding a parameter to !clrstack allowing only the first n frames to be printed #3093
    8.0.0
  • Add dotnet trace profile to enable collecting counters with the trace #3069
    8.0.0
  • Make EventPipe sample profile frequency configurable #3061
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe sample profile: missing thread state information #3060
    8.0.0
  • Landing page improvements #3039
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-counters renders incorrectly in certain situations #3036
    8.0.0
  • Ensure all tools properly surface connect and listen semantics for diagnostic ports #3033
    8.0.0
  • Add more profiles for dotnet trace with known .NET events #3026
    8.0.0
  • Soshelp does not show available switches #2999
    8.0.0
  • Suggestion: convert sosplugin commands to sub-commands of `sos` command #2998
    8.0.0
  • Improve SOS diagnostics for OSR methods #2992
    8.0.0
  • Run tests with dotnet trace #2989
    8.0.0
  • Visual Studio stacks elide some CLR frames in mixed mode #2982
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-stack should filter out its immediate parent `dotnet` process if any #2977
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: provide profiling api like pprof of Go #2948
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fixed dotnet-counters rendering issues #3353
